idea-plugin.name: Base16 Flat

idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Flat for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Chris Kempson (http://chriskempson.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
